description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0335 (Repeat Pattern)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

valueString.value: From the French jour (day). If <integer> is missing, the repeat rate is assumed to be 1. Day numbers are counted from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday. So Q2J2 means every second Tuesday; Q1J6 means every Saturday.

display.value: repeats on a particular day of the week,

definition.value: repeats on a particular day of the week,

display.value: twice a day at institution-specified times

definition.value: twice a day at institution-specified times

display.value: three times a day at institution-specified times

definition.value: three times a day at institution-specified times

display.value: four times a day at institution-specified times

definition.value: four times a day at institution-specified times

valueString.value: (e.g., 5ID=five times per day; 8ID=8 times per day)

display.value: "X" times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.

definition.value: "X" times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.

display.value: in the morning at institution-specified time

definition.value: in the morning at institution-specified time

display.value: during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified times

definition.value: during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified times

display.value: every day before the hour of sleep

definition.value: every day before the hour of sleep

display.value: in the evening at institution-specified time

definition.value: in the evening at institution-specified time

display.value: service is provided continuously between start time and stop time

definition.value: service is provided continuously between start time and stop time

display.value: for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.

definition.value: for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.

valueString.value: (e.g., PRNQ6H); given as needed over the frequency period.

display.value: where xxx is some frequency code

definition.value: where xxx is some frequency code

valueString.value: This is also the default when this component is null.
(e.g., between this meal and the next, between dinner and sleep
